name: Waiting (in Godot)
description:
A short experience about waiting and testing your patience. Or simply put: click things at the right time!

This game uses the following sounds from OpenGameArt and Freesound:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/boiling-water-loops
  • https://opengameart.org/content/engines-startup-idle-rev
  • https://opengameart.org/content/doorbell-ring
  • https://freesound.org/people/so0rec/sounds/542590/

Change Log:

  • Small cosmetic upgrades: Font, Telephone Particles, Bus Acceleration
